scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd client && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true npm run build && cp -rf build ../api
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../api && npm run lint
scripts.test:coverage: cd client && npm run test:coverage && cd ../api && npm run test:coverage
